sentences.sContent: The production lines ground to a halt for hours while technicians tried to debug software.
sentences.sCn: 生产线陷入停顿数小时，与此同时，技术人员尽力排除软件故障。

phrases.pCn: [计]调试监测程序；翟监督程序

words.tran: 调试器；[计] 调试程序

trans.tranCn: 调试；除错，改正有毛病部分；[军] 除去窃听器
trans.tranOther: to remove secret listening equipment from a place
